& se wind geswac þa,
& wearð mycel smyltnes.
WSCp MARK 4.40 & he sæde him,
hwi synt ge forhte;
Gyt ge nabbað geleafan.
WSCp MARK 4.41 & hi micclum ege him ondredon, & cwædon ælc to oðrum,
hwæt wenst þu,
hwæt is ðes þæt him wyndas & sæ hyrsumiað?
WSCp MARK 5.1 Ða comon hi ofer þære sæs muðan on þæt rice Hierasenorum.
WSCp MARK 5.2 & him of scipe gangendum him sona agen arn an man of þam byrgenum on unclænum gaste.
WSCp MARK 5.3 Se hæfde on byrgenum scræf
& hine nan man mid racenteagum ne mihte gebindan.
WSCp MARK 5.4 Forþam he oft mid fotcoppsum & racenteagum gebunden, toslat þa raceteaga & þa fotcoppsas tobræc,
& hine nan man gewyldan ne mihte.
WSCp MARK 5.5 & symle dæges & nihtes he wæs on byrgenum and on muntum, hrymende & hine sylfne mid stanum ceorfende.
WSCp MARK 5.6 Soðlice ða he þone hælend feorran geseah, he arn & hine gebæd. WSCp MARK 5.7 & mycelre stemne hrymende & þus cwæð,
eala mæra hælend Godes sunu, hwæt is me & þe;
Ic halsige þe ðurh God þæt ðu me ne þreage.
WSCp MARK 5.8 Þa cwæð se hælend,
eala unclæna gast, ga of ðysum men.
WSCp MARK 5.9 Ða ahsode he hine,
hwæt is þin nama;
þa cwæð he,
min nama is Legio, forþam we manega synt.
WSCp MARK 5.10 & he hine swyðe bæd þæt he hine of þam rice ne dyde.
WSCp MARK 5.11 Þar wæs embe þone munt mycel swyna heord læsgende.
WSCp MARK 5.12 & þa unclænan gastas hine bædon & cwædon,
send us on þas swyn þæt we on hi gegan.
WSCp MARK 5.13 & þa lyfde se hælend sona,
& ða eodon þa unclænan gastas on þa swyn,
& on myclum hryre seo heord wearð on sæ besceofen twa þusendo & wurdon adruncene on ðære sæ.
WSCp MARK 5.14 Soþlice þa ðe hi heoldon flugon & cyddon on þære ceastre & on lande
& hi ut eodon þæt hi gesawon hwæt þar gedon wære.
WSCp MARK 5.15 & hi comon to þam hælende
& hi gesawon þone ðe mid deofle gedreht wæs, gescrydne sittan, & hales modes,
& hi him ondredon.
WSCp MARK 5.16 & hi rehton him þa ðe hit gesawon hu hit gedon wæs, be þam ðe deofolseocnesse hæfde & be þam swynum.
WSCp MARK 5.17 & hi bædon þæt he of hyra gemærum fore.
WSCp MARK 5.18 Þa he on scip eode hine ongan biddan se ðe ær mid deofle gedreht wæs, þæt he mid him wære.
WSCp MARK 5.19 Him þa se hælend ne getiðode,
ac he sæde him,
ga to þinum huse to þinum hiwum & cyð him hu mycel Drihten gedyde & he gemiltsode þe.
WSCp MARK 5.20 And he ða ferde & ongan bodigean on Decapolim hu fela se hælend him dyde,
& hig ealle þæs wundredon.
WSCp MARK 5.21 And þa se hælend eft on scype ferde ofer þone muþan him com to mycel menigu & wæs ymbe þa sæ.
WSCp MARK 5.22 & ða com sum of heahgesamnungum Iairus hatte,
& þa he hine geseah he astrehte hine to his fotum. WSCp MARK 5.23 & hine swyðe bæd,
& he cwæð,
Min dohtor is on ytemestum siðe,
cum & sete þine hand ofer hi þæt heo hal sy & lybbe.
WSCp MARK 5.24 Ða ferde he mid him
& him fyligde mycel menigeo & þrungon hine.

WSCp MARK 5.25 & þa þæt wif ðe on blodryne twelf winter wæs & fram manegum læcum fela þinga þolode, & dælde eall þæt heo ahte, & hit naht ne fremode, ac wæs þe wyrse. WSCp MARK 5.27 Þa heo be ðam hælende gehyrde heo com wiðæftan þa menigu & his reaf æthran.
WSCp MARK 5.28 Soðlice heo cwæð,
gif ic furþon his reafes æthrine ic beo hal.
WSCp MARK 5.29 And þa sona wearð hyre blodes ryne adruwod,
& heo on hire gefredde þæt heo of þam wite gehæled wæs.
WSCp MARK 5.30 And þa se hælend oncneow on him sylfum þæt him mægen ofeode; He cwæð bewend to þære menigu,
hwa æthran mines reafes?
WSCp MARK 5.31 Þa cwædon his leorningcnihtas
þu gesyxst þas menigu þe ðringende,
& þu cwyst,
hwa æthran me?
WSCp MARK 5.32 And þa beseah he hine þæt he gesawe þæne ðe þæt dyde.
WSCp MARK 5.33 Ðat wif þa ondrædende & forhtigende com & astrehte hi beforan him & sæde him eall þæt riht.
WSCp MARK 5.34 Þa cwæð se hælend,
dohtor þin geleafa þe hale gedyde;
Ga þe on sibbe & beo of ðisum hal.
WSCp MARK 5.35 Him þa gyt sprecendum hi comon fram þam heahgesamnungum & cwædon,
ðin dohtor is dead;
Hwi drecst þu leng þone lareow?
WSCp MARK 5.36 Þa he gehyrde þæt word þa cwæð se hælend,
